I enjoy building streamlined, modern, and user-friendly applications, and I am always ready to pick up a new technology I am at my best when solving problems where I can express my creativity both logically and visually

Slacker

A clone of Slack where users can create profiles and live chat with each other while accessing different channels.

(Technologies Used: React.js, Redux, Flask, PostgreSQL, Python, Node.js, HTML, CSS, Socket.io, Render, Git)

  • Developed server-side logic and APIs required for connecting channel functionality and implemented user interface with an intuitive and responsive design.
